# SET THE SCORING METRICS YOU WANT GRIDSEARCH TO OPTIMIZE FOR
scorers = {
    'precision_score': make_scorer(precision_score),
    'recall_score': make_scorer(recall_score)
}

param_grid = [
              {'penalty': ['l2', 'l1', 'elasticnet'], 'alpha': [.0001, .001, .01], 'learning_rate': ['optimal', 'invscaling', 'adaptive']}
]

sgd = SGDClassifier()

# REFIT SHOULD BE SET TO THE STRING OF THE ONE SCORING METRIC YOU WANT USED TO FIND THE BEST PARAMETERS FOR REFITTING THE ESTIMATOR AT THE END
grid_search = GridSearchCV(sgd, param_grid, cv=5,
                           scoring = scorers,
                           refit = 'recall_score')

grid_search.fit(X_train_mod, y_train)
